title: Does anyone feel like Malphite may be just a TAD over powered?

replies.body: No learn to counter him its very easy...
Enlighten me
dodge
I concur fine sir...
1000 range ez initiation yep
malphite darius nor garen are in any where near the realm of op fucking neck urselfves
Not Reeaaaaallly?

He can build literally full tank and do tremendous amounts of damage. Which is exactly what the juggernauts are, except they don't have a way into the team like Malphite does, and that way just happens to also be one of if not the best means of intiation in the game. And after, he still does plenty of AOE, CC and stickiness to boot. 

I feel like his numbers are slightly overtuned, truly.
so can rammus and tahm and garen and sion and illaoi, what is your point?
illaoi is kiteable, so is tahm and he doesnt do that much damage, garen is kiteable and sion does fuckall damage.
there you go, summing up malphite right there
rofl malphite is not easily kiteable. He DOES do a lot of damage for how tanky he is.

say that to kalista or an ezreal with a frozen gauntlet

vayne and ashe would also like to have a word with you
Oh and the Malphite has team mates, who can kill Kalista, Blue Ez, Vayne and Ash during the knockup
well, its not my fault those people are retarded enough to bunch up for a malphite, keep spaced out god dang
There are far way more overpowered juggernauts than him(Garen,Darius etc) If you think malphite is op just go near a darius or garen and they will literally delete you.
Okay, here is the problem. Garen and Darius need you to go near them. Malphite doesn't.
